text: Urania is a small town in La Salle Parish, Louisiana United States. The population was 698 at the 2020 census. Urania is taken from the Greek muse of astronomy. Hardtner served in both houses of the Louisiana State Legislature from La Salle Parish as well as long service on the La Salle Parish Police Jury.Anna C. Burns, "Henry E. Hardtner: Louisiana's First Conservationist," Journal of Forest History, Vol. 22, No. 2 (April 1978), pp. 76-85 ==References== Category:Towns in La Salle Parish, Louisiana
title: Urania, Louisiana
